Button colors
Standard Bootstrap buttons and color variants


Button Link anchor tag
Gradient Button colors
Add class .btn-gradientto standard Bootstrap buttons
Button Flat
Add class .btn-flatto standard Bootstrap buttons
Button Outline
Add class .btn-outline-secondary.btn-outline-primary.btn-outline-success.btn-outline-info.btn-outline-warning.btn-outline-dangerto standard Bootstrap buttons
Button Circle
Add class .btn-circleto standard Bootstrap buttons
Button Labeled
Special buttons supporting icons labels


Button sizing
Add class .btn-xl, .btn-lg, .btn-smto standard Bootstrap buttons

Button group
Organize buttons in groups
Button Pills
Add class .btn-pill-leftor.btn-pill-rightto standard Bootstrap buttons

Pill left

Pill right

Button Oval
Add class .btn-ovalto standard Bootstrap buttons
Button Square
Add class .btn-squareto standard Bootstrap buttons
